description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battle it out with Nukes in this fast paced multiplayer card game! Similar to UNO and Rummy, get rid of all your cards first to win. Play against up to 7 other players in an xbox live deathmatch or team up with local and or remote players in an xbox live cooperative match.  Play locally against the CPU with up to 4 local players.
